name: 曾恕銘
objective: 課程主要為介紹機器學習概念和基本原理，學習 DNN/CNN/LSTM/transformer 的神經網路架構和其他機器學習方法。
schedule:
1.	Introduction with computer tool
2.	DNN with labs and case study radio resource allocation (optional)
3.	Learning method with labs
4.	CNN with labs
5.	RNN LSTM with lab and case study 5G polar code decoding (optional)
6.	Analogizers: K-means, kNN, SVM
7.	Self-attention (transformer) with case study scene boundary detection
8.	Naïve Bayes classifier (Baysian statistics optional)
9.	Symbolists: Decision Tree
10.	Autodecoder/ neural style transfer with labs
scorePolicy:
口頭報告 20%
考試 25%
Lab report 25%
Project 30%
